name: Idle Pet Shop Tycoon
description:
Idle Pet Shop is a animal store simulator where you can sell various virtual animals! Build a fun place for all your favorite lovable animals to share with your friends! Buy new animals of different breeds, upgrade the shop, customize it and invite more customers.

Build, expand and decorate your little pet shop, so you can have more and more pets! Create an ever better environment for your pets and show everyone how great a caregiver you are!

Running your little pet shop is amazing fun with these features:
- Get the cutest puppies, kitties, ponnys, rabbits and atc. Breed pets and see their unique looks.
- Discover and upgrade pet store! Design a Pet Shop that’s fun for the animals and for you!
- Meet more custormers and make friends. More people - more fun!
- Sharp stunning graphics and animations
- Absolutely no clean up or doggy bags required! What a great store!

Idle Pet Shop is that you are looking for free pet game for your device!
If you love animals, Idle Pet Shop is the best simulation and pet shopgame ever!
Download now and start having fun with cute pets! Become a pet shop magnate!
